title: China's industrial profits plunge by 17.8% in August from a year ago
content: China's industrial profits plunged by 17.8% in August from a year ago, the National Bureau of Statistics said Friday.
summary: China's industrial profits plunged by 17.8% in August from a year ago, the National Bureau of Statistics said Friday.

title: The Fed slashed interest rates last week, but Treasury yields are rising. What's going on?
content: Despite a 50 basis point rate reduction, Treasury yields have been moving higher, particularly at the long end of the curve.
summary: Despite a 50 basis point rate reduction, Treasury yields have been moving higher, particularly at the long end of the curve.

title: Japan's ruling party votes to elect new leader and country's next prime minister
content: Japan's ruling party will elect the successor to outgoing Prime Minister Fumio Kishida on Friday in a race likely to decide the next leader of the nation.
summary: Japan's ruling party will elect the successor to outgoing Prime Minister Fumio Kishida on Friday in a race likely to decide the next leader of the nation.

title: China's Xi and top leaders call for halting real estate decline, responding to public concerns

title: Bank of Japan board members split over monetary policy path, meeting minutes show
